mapper.select:
select count(*) from
matching_board notice_board appraise_board
where
${searchItem} like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' and status = 0
and matchingid is null

select
, matchingid , to_char(appointedtime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as appointedTime , roomNum
, datanum
from
matching_board notice_board appraise_board
where status = 0
and matchingid is null
and
${searchItem} like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by boardnum desc

select
, matchingid , to_char(appointedtime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as appointedTime , roomNum
, datanum
from
matching_board notice_board appraise_board
where status = 1 and rownum <= 3 order by boardnum desc

select
, matchingid , to_char(appointedtime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as appointedTime , roomNum
, datanum
from
matching_board notice_board appraise_board
where boardnum = #{boardNum}
select roomnum, appointedtime from matching_board where (userid = #{value} OR matchingid = #{value}) AND appointedtime > sysdate order by appointedtime asc
